 11# ######################## PIMU #################################
 12
 13"""
 14The PIMU is the power and IMU Arduino board in the base
 15"""
 16
 17
 18class IMUBase(Device):
 19    """
 20    API to the Stretch IMU found in the base
 21    """
 22    def __init__(self):
 23        Device.__init__(self, 'imu',req_params=False)
 24        #pitch; //-180 to 180, rolls over
 25        #roll; //-90 to  90, rolls over at 180
 26        #heading; //0-360.0, rolls over
 27        self.status={'ax':0,'ay':0,'az':0,'gx':0,'gy':0,'gz':0,'mx':0,'my':0,'mz':0,'roll':0,'pitch':0,'heading':0,'timestamp':0,'qw':0,'qx':0,'qy':0,'qz':0,'bump':0}
 28
 29    def get_status(self):
 30        s=self.status.copy()
 31        return s
 32
 33    def get_quaternion(self):
 34        return [self.status['qw'],self.status['qx'],self.status['qy'],self.status['qz']]
 35    # ####################################################
 36
 37    def pretty_print(self):
 38        print('----------IMU -------------')
 39        print('AX (m/s^2)', self.status['ax'])
 40        print('AY (m/s^2)', self.status['ay'])
 41        print('AZ (m/s^2)', self.status['az'])
 42        print('GX (rad/s)', self.status['gx'])
 43        print('GY (rad/s)', self.status['gy'])
 44        print('GZ (rad/s)', self.status['gz'])
 45        print('MX (uTesla)', self.status['mx'])
 46        print('MY (uTesla)', self.status['my'])
 47        print('MZ (uTesla)', self.status['mz'])
 48        print('QW', self.status['qw'])
 49        print('QX', self.status['qx'])
 50        print('QY', self.status['qy'])
 51        print('QZ', self.status['qz'])
 52        print('Roll (deg)', rad_to_deg(self.status['roll']))
 53        print('Pitch (deg)', rad_to_deg(self.status['pitch']))
 54        print('Heading (deg)', rad_to_deg(self.status['heading']))
 55        print('Bump', self.status['bump'])
 56        print('Timestamp (s)', self.status['timestamp'])
 57        print('-----------------------')
 58
 59    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None):
 60        if unpack_to is None:
 61            unpack_to = self.status
 62        sidx = 0
 63        unpack_to['ax'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 64        unpack_to['ay'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 65        unpack_to['az'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 66        unpack_to['gx'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 67        unpack_to['gy'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 68        unpack_to['gz'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 69        unpack_to['mx'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 70        unpack_to['my'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 71        unpack_to['mz'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 72        unpack_to['roll'] = deg_to_rad(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 4
 73        unpack_to['pitch'] = deg_to_rad(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 4
 74        unpack_to['heading'] = deg_to_rad(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 4
 75        unpack_to['qw'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 76        unpack_to['qx'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 77        unpack_to['qy'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 78        unpack_to['qz'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 79        unpack_to['bump'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
 80        return sidx

 83# ######################## IMU PROTOCOL P0 #################################
 84class IMU_Protocol_P0(IMUBase):
 85    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None):
 86        if unpack_to is None:
 87            unpack_to = self.status
 88        sidx =  IMUBase.unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to)
 89        self.status['timestamp'] = self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 4
 90        return sidx
 91
 92# ######################## IMU PROTOCOL P1 #################################
 93class IMU_Protocol_P1(IMUBase):
 94    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None):
 95        if unpack_to is None:
 96            unpack_to = self.status
 97        sidx = IMUBase.unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to)
 98        return sidx
 99
100# ######################## IMU #################################
101class IMU(IMUBase):
102    def __init__(self):
103        IMUBase.__init__(self)
104        # Order in descending order so more recent protocols/methods override less recent
105        self.supported_protocols = {'p0': (IMU_Protocol_P0,), 'p1': (IMU_Protocol_P1,IMU_Protocol_P0,),
106                                    'p2': (IMU_Protocol_P1,IMU_Protocol_P0,),'p3': (IMU_Protocol_P1,IMU_Protocol_P0,),
107                                    'p4': (IMU_Protocol_P1,IMU_Protocol_P0,)}
108
109# ##################################################################################
110class PimuBase(Device):
111    """
112    API to the Stretch Power and IMU board (Pimu)
113    """
114    RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG = 1
115    RPC_REPLY_PIMU_CONFIG = 2
116    RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS = 3
117    RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS = 4
118    RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER = 5
119    RPC_REPLY_PIMU_TRIGGER = 6
120    RPC_GET_PIMU_BOARD_INFO = 7
121    RPC_REPLY_PIMU_BOARD_INFO = 8
122    RPC_SET_MOTOR_SYNC = 9
123    RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC = 10
124    RPC_READ_TRACE =11
125    RPC_REPLY_READ_TRACE =12
126    RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS_AUX = 13
127    RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS_AUX = 14
128    RPC_LOAD_TEST_PULL = 15
129    RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL = 16
130    RPC_LOAD_TEST_PUSH = 17
131    RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH = 18
132
133    STATE_AT_CLIFF_0 = 1
134    STATE_AT_CLIFF_1 = 2
135    STATE_AT_CLIFF_2 = 4
136    STATE_AT_CLIFF_3 = 8
137    STATE_RUNSTOP_EVENT = 16
138    STATE_CLIFF_EVENT = 32
139    STATE_FAN_ON = 64
140    STATE_BUZZER_ON = 128
141    STATE_LOW_VOLTAGE_ALERT = 256
142    STATE_OVER_TILT_ALERT = 512
143    STATE_HIGH_CURRENT_ALERT = 1024
144    STATE_CHARGER_CONNECTED = 2048
145    STATE_BOOT_DETECTED = 4096
146    STATE_IS_TRACE_ON = 8192
147
148    TRIGGER_BOARD_RESET = 1
149    TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_RESET = 2
150    TRIGGER_CLIFF_EVENT_RESET = 4
151    TRIGGER_BUZZER_ON = 8
152    TRIGGER_BUZZER_OFF = 16
153    TRIGGER_FAN_ON = 32
154    TRIGGER_FAN_OFF = 64
155    TRIGGER_IMU_RESET = 128
156    TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_ON = 256
157    TRIGGER_BEEP = 512
158    TRIGGER_LIGHTBAR_TEST = 1024
159    TRIGGER_ENABLE_TRACE= 2048
160    TRIGGER_DISABLE_TRACE=4096
161
162
163    TRACE_TYPE_STATUS = 0
164    TRACE_TYPE_DEBUG = 1
165    TRACE_TYPE_PRINT = 2

168    def __init__(self, event_reset=False, usb=None):
169        Device.__init__(self, 'pimu')
170        self.config = self.params['config']
171        self.imu = IMU()
172        self._dirty_config = True
173        self._dirty_trigger = False
174        self.frame_id_last = None
175        self.frame_id_base = 0
176        if usb is None:
177            usb = self.params['usb_name']
178        self.transport = Transport(usb=usb, logger=self.logger)
179        self.status = {'voltage': 0, 'current': 0, 'temp': 0,'cpu_temp': 0, 'cliff_range':[0,0,0,0], 'frame_id': 0,
180                       'timestamp': 0,'at_cliff':[False,False,False,False], 'runstop_event': False, 'bump_event_cnt': 0,
181                       'cliff_event': False, 'fan_on': False, 'buzzer_on': False, 'low_voltage_alert':False,'high_current_alert':False,'over_tilt_alert':False,
182                       'charger_connected':False, 'boot_detected':False,'imu': self.imu.status,'debug':0,'state':0,'trace_on':0,
183                       'motor_sync_rate': 0, 'motor_sync_cnt': 0, 'motor_sync_queues': 0, 'motor_sync_drop': 0,
184                       'transport': self.transport.status, 'current_charge':0}
185
186        self.status_zero=self.status.copy()
187        self.status_aux = {'foo': 0}
188
189        self._trigger=0
190        self.ts_last_fan_on=None
191        self.fan_on_last=False
192        #Reset PIMU state so that Ctrl-C and re-instantiate Pimu class is efficient way to get out of an event
193        if event_reset:
194            self.runstop_event_reset()
195            self.cliff_event_reset()
196
197        self.board_info = {'board_variant': None, 'firmware_version': None, 'protocol_version': None,'hardware_id':0}
198        self.hw_valid = False
199        self.ts_last_motor_sync=None
200        self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn=None
201        self.load_test_payload = arr.array('B', range(256)) * 4
202        self.ts_get_cpu_temp=0
203        self.get_cpu_temp()
204
205    # ###########  Device Methods #############
206
207    def startup(self, threaded=False):
208        try:
209            Device.startup(self, threaded=threaded)
210            self.hw_valid = self.transport.startup()
211            if self.hw_valid:
212                payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_BOARD_INFO])
213                self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_board_info_reply)
214                self.transport.configure_version(self.board_info['firmware_version'])
215                return True
216            return False
217        except KeyError:
218            self.hw_valid =False
219            return False
220
221
222    def stop(self):
223        Device.stop(self)
224        if not self.hw_valid:
225            return
226        self.set_fan_off()
227        self.push_command(exiting=True)
228        self.transport.stop()
229        self.hw_valid = False
230
231    def set_config(self,c):
232        self.config=c.copy()
233        self._dirty_config = True
234
235    def pull_status(self, exiting=False):
236        if not self.hw_valid:
237            return
238        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS])
239        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_status_reply)
240
241    async def pull_status_async(self, exiting=False):
242        if not self.hw_valid:
243            return
244        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS])
245        await self.transport.do_pull_rpc_async(payload, self.rpc_status_reply, exiting=exiting)
246
247    async def push_command_async(self, exiting=False):
248        if not self.hw_valid:
249            return
250        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
251        if self._dirty_config:
252            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
253            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
254            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
255            self._dirty_config = False
256
257        if self._dirty_trigger:
258            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
259            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
260            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
261            self._trigger = 0
262            self._dirty_trigger = False
263
264    def push_command(self, exiting=False):
265        if not self.hw_valid:
266            return
267        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
268        if self._dirty_config:
269            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
270            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
271            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
272            self._dirty_config = False
273
274        if self._dirty_trigger:
275            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
276            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
277            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
278            self._trigger = 0
279            self._dirty_trigger = False
280
281    def pretty_print(self):
282        print('------ Pimu -----')
283        print('Voltage',self.status['voltage'])
284        print('Current', self.status['current'])
285        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>=3:
286            print('Current Charge',self.status['current_charge'])
287        print('CPU Temp',self.status['cpu_temp'])
288        print('Board Temp', self.status['temp'])
289        print('State', self.status['state'])
290        print('At Cliff', self.status['at_cliff'])
291        print('Cliff Range', self.status['cliff_range'])
292        print('Cliff Event', self.status['cliff_event'])
293        print('Runstop Event', self.status['runstop_event'])
294        print('Bump Event Cnt', self.status['bump_event_cnt'])
295        print('Fan On', self.status['fan_on'])
296        print('Buzzer On', self.status['buzzer_on'])
297        print('Low Voltage Alert', self.status['low_voltage_alert'])
298        print('High Current Alert', self.status['high_current_alert'])
299        print('Over Tilt Alert',self.status['over_tilt_alert'])
300        print('Trace on:', self.status['trace_on'])
301        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>0:
302            print('Charger Connected', self.status['charger_connected'])
303            print('Boot Detected', self.status['boot_detected'])
304        print('Debug', self.status['debug'])
305        print('Timestamp (s)', self.status['timestamp'])
306        #print('Read error', self.transport.status['read_error'])
307        print('Queued motor sync', self.status['motor_sync_queues'])
308        print('Motor sync rate', self.status['motor_sync_rate'])
309        print('Motor sync cnt', self.status['motor_sync_cnt'])
310        print('Board variant:',self.board_info['board_variant'])
311        print('Firmware version:', self.board_info['firmware_version'])
312        print('Transport version:', self.transport.version)
313        self.imu.pretty_print()

318    def runstop_event_reset(self):
319        """
320        Reset the robot runstop, allowing motion to continue
321        """
322        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_RESET
323        self._dirty_trigger=True
324
325    def runstop_event_trigger(self):
326        """
327        Trigger the robot runstop, stopping motion
328        """
329        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_ON
330        self._dirty_trigger=True
331
332    def trigger_beep(self):
333        """
334        Generate a single short beep
335        """
336        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_BEEP
337        self._dirty_trigger=True
338
339    def trigger_lightbar_test(self):
340        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_LIGHTBAR_TEST
341        self._dirty_trigger = True
342
343    # ####################### Utility functions ####################################################
344    def imu_reset(self):
345        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_IMU_RESET
346        self._dirty_trigger=True
347
348
349    def is_ready_for_sync(self):
350        # For RE1.0 robots (hardware_id==0) the runstop and sync line are shared
351        # This limits the maximum rate that the motor sync can be triggered
352        # For RE2.0 robots the sync rate is limited by the min pulse width (~10ms)
353        #Track the rate that the sync is triggered
354        # This is called once prior to issuing stepper push_commands
355        # If it is True then trigger_motor_sync is safe to call after the push_commands
356        # By calling it first, it ensures that the sync rate is accurate (eg, not measuring timing of RPC, etc)
357        t = time.time()
358        if self.ts_last_motor_sync is not None:
359            rate=1 / (t - self.ts_last_motor_sync)
360            if rate>self.params['max_sync_rate_hz']:
361                self.status['motor_sync_drop'] += 1
362                if self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn is None or t-self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn>5.0:
363                    print('Warning: Rate of calls to Pimu:trigger_motor_sync rate of %f above maximum frequency of %.2f Hz. Motor commands dropped: %d'%(rate,self.params['max_sync_rate_hz'],self.status['motor_sync_drop']))
364                    self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn=t
365                return False
366            self.status['motor_sync_rate'] = rate #Only update rate if it is ready
367        return True
368
369    def trigger_motor_sync(self):
370        #Push out immediately
371        if not self.hw_valid:
372            return
373        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_SET_MOTOR_SYNC])
374        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_motor_sync_reply)
375        self.ts_last_motor_sync = time.time()
376
377
378    def set_fan_on(self):
379        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_FAN_ON
380        self._dirty_trigger=True
381
382    def set_fan_off(self):
383        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_FAN_OFF
384        self._dirty_trigger=True

392        self._dirty_trigger=True

402    # ########### Sensor Calibration #################
403    def get_voltage(self,raw):
404        raw_to_V = 20.0/1024 #10bit adc, 0-20V per 0-3.3V reading
405        return raw*raw_to_V
406
407
408    def get_temp(self,raw):
409        raw_to_mV = 3300/1024.0
410        mV = raw*raw_to_mV - 400 #400mV at 0C per spec
411        C = mV/19.5 #19.5mV per C per spec
412        return C
413
414    def get_current(self,raw):
415        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>=3:
416            return self.get_current_efuse(raw)
417        else:
418            return self.get_current_shunt(raw)
419    def get_current_shunt(self,raw):
420        """
421        RE1 / RE2 Pimus using shunt resistor for current measurement
422        """
423        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
424        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
425        mA = mV/.408 # conversion per circuit
426        return mA/1000.0
427
428    def get_current_efuse(self,raw):
429        """
430        S3 Pimu's using Efuse current measurement
431        """
432        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
433        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
434        mA = mV/.224 # conversion per circuit
435        return mA/1000.0
436
437    def get_current_charge(self,raw):
438        """
439        S3 Pimu's shunt measurement of charger current
440        """
441        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
442        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
443        mA = mV/.215 # conversion per circuit
444        return mA/1000.0
445    # ################Data Packing #####################
446
447    def unpack_board_info(self,s):
448        sidx=0
449        self.board_info['board_variant'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
450        self.board_info['hardware_id'] = 0
451        if len(self.board_info['board_variant'])==6: #New format of Pimu.x Older format of Pimu.BoardName.Vx' If older format,default to 0
452            self.board_info['hardware_id']=int(self.board_info['board_variant'][-1])
453        sidx += 20
454        self.board_info['firmware_version'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
455        self.board_info['protocol_version'] = self.board_info['firmware_version'][self.board_info['firmware_version'].rfind('p'):]
456        sidx += 20
457        return sidx
458
459    def pack_config(self,s,sidx):
460        for i in range(4):
461            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_zero'][i])
462            sidx += 4
463        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_thresh']);sidx += 4
464        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_LPF']);sidx += 4
465        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['voltage_LPF']);sidx += 4
466        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['current_LPF']);sidx += 4
467        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['temp_LPF']);sidx += 4
468        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_cliff']); sidx += 1
469        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_runstop']);sidx += 1
470        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_tilt']);sidx += 1
471        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_low_voltage']);sidx += 1
472        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_high_current']); sidx += 1
473        for i in range(3):
474            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_offsets'][i])
475            sidx += 4
476        for i in range(9):
477            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_softiron_matrix'][i])
478            sidx += 4
479        for i in range(3):
480            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gyro_zero_offsets'][i])
481            sidx += 4
482        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['rate_gyro_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
483        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gravity_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
484        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['accel_LPF']); sidx += 4
485        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['bump_thresh']); sidx += 4
486        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['low_voltage_alert']);sidx += 4
487        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['high_current_alert']);sidx += 4
488        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['over_tilt_alert']); sidx += 4
489        return sidx
490
491    def pack_trigger(self,s,sidx):
492        pack_uint32_t(s,sidx,self._trigger); sidx+=4
493        return sidx
494
495    def unpack_status(self,s, unpack_to=None):
496        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
497            .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))
498

500        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
501                                  .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

505                                  .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

508        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
509                                  .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))
510

512        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
513                                  .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

517        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
518            .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

522        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
523                                  .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

531    def rpc_motor_sync_reply(self,reply):
532        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC:
533            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC', reply[0])

535    def rpc_config_reply(self,reply):
536        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_CONFIG:
537            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_CONFIG', reply[0])
538
539    def rpc_board_info_reply(self,reply):
540        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_BOARD_INFO:
541            self.unpack_board_info(reply[1:])
542        else:
543            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_BOARD_INFO', reply[0])

545    def rpc_trigger_reply(self,reply):
546        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_TRIGGER:
547            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_TRIGGER', reply[0])
548        else:
549            tt=unpack_uint32_t(reply[1:])
550
551    def rpc_status_reply(self,reply):
552        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS:
553            self.unpack_status(reply[1:])
554        else:
555            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS', reply[0])

558    # ################ Sentry #####################
559    def get_cpu_temp(self):
560        #Note, this call can be slow
561        cpu_temp = 0
562        try:
563            t = psutil.sensors_temperatures()['coretemp']
564            for c in t:
565                cpu_temp = max(cpu_temp, c.current)
566        except(KeyError, IOError): #May not be available on virtual machines
567            cpu_temp=25.0
568        return cpu_temp
569
570    def step_sentry(self,robot=None):
571        if self.hw_valid and self.robot_params['robot_sentry']['base_fan_control']:
572            #Manage CPU temp using the mobile base fan
573            #See https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000005946/intel-nuc.html
574
575            if time.time()-self.ts_get_cpu_temp>10.0: #Once every 10s as is slow changing and is a slow sys call
576                self.status['cpu_temp']=self.get_cpu_temp()
577                self.ts_get_cpu_temp=time.time()
578            if self.status['cpu_temp']>self.params['base_fan_on']:
579                if self.ts_last_fan_on is None or time.time()-self.ts_last_fan_on>3.0: #Will turn itself off if don't refresh command
580                    self.set_fan_on()
581                    self.push_command()
582                    self.ts_last_fan_on = time.time()
583                if  not self.status['fan_on']:
584                    self.logger.debug('Base fan turned on')
585
586            if self.fan_on_last and not self.status['fan_on']:
587                self.logger.debug('Base fan turned off')
588
589            if self.status['cpu_temp']<self.params['base_fan_off']and self.status['fan_on']:
590                self.set_fan_off()
591                self.push_command()
592            self.fan_on_last = self.status['fan_on']
593

599class Pimu_Protocol_P0(PimuBase):
600    def unpack_status(self,s, unpack_to=None):
601        if unpack_to is None:
602            unpack_to = self.status
603        sidx=0
604        sidx +=self.imu.unpack_status((s[sidx:]))
605        unpack_to['voltage']=self.get_voltage(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
606        unpack_to['current'] = self.get_current(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
607        unpack_to['temp'] = self.get_temp(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
608
609        for i in range(4):
610            unpack_to['cliff_range'][i]=unpack_float_t(s[sidx:])
611            sidx+=4
612
613        unpack_to['state'] = unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])
614        sidx += 4
615
616        unpack_to['at_cliff']=[]
617        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_0) != 0)
618        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_1) != 0)
619        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_2) != 0)
620        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_3) != 0)
621        unpack_to['runstop_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_RUNSTOP_EVENT) != 0
622        unpack_to['cliff_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CLIFF_EVENT) != 0
623        unpack_to['fan_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_FAN_ON) != 0
624        unpack_to['buzzer_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BUZZER_ON) != 0
625        unpack_to['low_voltage_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_LOW_VOLTAGE_ALERT) != 0
626        unpack_to['high_current_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_HIGH_CURRENT_ALERT) != 0
627        unpack_to['over_tilt_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_OVER_TILT_ALERT) != 0
628        unpack_to['charger_connected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CHARGER_CONNECTED) != 0
629        unpack_to['boot_detected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BOOT_DETECTED) != 0
630        unpack_to['timestamp'] = self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])); sidx += 4
631        unpack_to['bump_event_cnt'] = unpack_uint16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
632        unpack_to['debug'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]); sidx += 4
633        return sidx

677# ######################## PIMU PROTOCOL P2 #################################
678class Pimu_Protocol_P2(PimuBase):
679
680    def read_firmware_trace(self):
681        self.trace_buf = []
682        self.timestamp.reset() #Timestamp holds state, reset within lock to avoid threading issues
683        self.n_trace_read=1
684        ts=time.time()
685        while ( self.n_trace_read) and time.time()-ts<60.0:
686            payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_READ_TRACE])
687            self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_read_firmware_trace_reply)
688            time.sleep(.001)
689        return self.trace_buf
690
691    def unpack_debug_trace(self,s,unpack_to):
692        sidx=0
693        unpack_to['u8_1']=unpack_uint8_t(s[sidx:]);sidx+=1
694        unpack_to['u8_2'] = unpack_uint8_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 1
695        unpack_to['f_1'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
696        unpack_to['f_2'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
697        unpack_to['f_3'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
698        return sidx
699
700    def unpack_print_trace(self,s,unpack_to):
701        sidx=0
702        line_len=32
703        unpack_to['timestamp']=self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint64_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 8
704        unpack_to['line'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], line_len); sidx += line_len
705        unpack_to['x'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
706        return sidx
707
708    def rpc_read_firmware_trace_reply(self, reply):
709        if len(reply)>0 and reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_READ_TRACE:
710            self.n_trace_read=reply[1]
711            self.trace_buf.append({'id': len(self.trace_buf), 'status': {},'debug':{},'print':{}})
712            if reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_STATUS:
713                self.trace_buf[-1]['status']= self.status_zero.copy()
714                self.unpack_status(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['status'])
715            elif reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_DEBUG:
716                self.unpack_debug_trace(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['debug'])
717            elif reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_PRINT:
718                self.unpack_print_trace(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['print'])
719            else:
720                print('Unrecognized trace type %d'%reply[2])
721        else:
722            print('Error RPC_REPLY_READ_TRACE')
723            self.n_trace_read=0
724            self.trace_buf = []
725    def enable_firmware_trace(self):
726        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_ENABLE_TRACE
727        self._dirty_trigger = True
728
729    def disable_firmware_trace(self):
730        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_DISABLE_TRACE
731        self._dirty_trigger = True
732
733    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None): #P2
734        if unpack_to is None:
735            unpack_to = self.status
736
737        sidx=0
738        sidx +=self.imu.unpack_status((s[sidx:]))
739        unpack_to['voltage']=self.get_voltage(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
740        unpack_to['current'] = self.get_current(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
741        unpack_to['temp'] = self.get_temp(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
742
743        for i in range(4):
744            unpack_to['cliff_range'][i]=unpack_float_t(s[sidx:])
745            sidx+=4
746
747        unpack_to['state'] = unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])
748        sidx += 4
749
750        unpack_to['at_cliff']=[]
751        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & PimuBase.STATE_AT_CLIFF_0) != 0)
752        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_1) != 0)
753        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_2) != 0)
754        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_3) != 0)
755        unpack_to['runstop_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_RUNSTOP_EVENT) != 0
756        unpack_to['cliff_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CLIFF_EVENT) != 0
757        unpack_to['fan_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_FAN_ON) != 0
758        unpack_to['buzzer_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BUZZER_ON) != 0
759        unpack_to['low_voltage_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_LOW_VOLTAGE_ALERT) != 0
760        unpack_to['high_current_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_HIGH_CURRENT_ALERT) != 0
761        unpack_to['over_tilt_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_OVER_TILT_ALERT) != 0
762        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>0:
763            unpack_to['charger_connected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CHARGER_CONNECTED) != 0
764            unpack_to['boot_detected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BOOT_DETECTED) != 0
765        unpack_to['trace_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_IS_TRACE_ON) != 0
766        unpack_to['timestamp'] = self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint64_t(s[sidx:])); sidx += 8
767        self.imu.status['timestamp'] = unpack_to['timestamp']
768        unpack_to['bump_event_cnt'] = unpack_uint16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
769        unpack_to['debug'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]); sidx += 4
770        return sidx

772# ######################## PIMU PROTOCOL P3 #################################
773class Pimu_Protocol_P3(PimuBase):
774
775
776    def is_ready_for_sync(self):
777        """
778        With P3 this function is no longer meaningful as sync overruns are handled on the fw level
779        """
780        return True
781    def trigger_motor_sync(self):
782        # Push out immediately
783        if not self.hw_valid:
784            return
785        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_SET_MOTOR_SYNC])
786        old_sync_cnt = self.status['motor_sync_cnt']
787        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_motor_sync_reply)
788
789        t=time.time()
790        # Should motor_sync_cnt should increment with each call to trigger_motor_sync, if not it is an overrun
791        if self.status['motor_sync_cnt'] == old_sync_cnt:
792            self.status['motor_sync_queues']=self.status['motor_sync_queues']+1
793            print('Warning: Queued motor_sync as trigger_motor_sync calls above maximum rate. Overruns: %d' % (self.status['motor_sync_queues']))
794            self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn = t
795
796        if self.ts_last_motor_sync is not None:
797            self.status['motor_sync_rate']=1 / (t - self.ts_last_motor_sync)
798        self.ts_last_motor_sync = t
799
800    def rpc_motor_sync_reply(self,reply):
801        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC:
802            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC', reply[0])
803        else:
804            self.unpack_motor_sync_reply(reply[1:])
805
806
807    def unpack_motor_sync_reply(self, s):
808        # take in an array of bytes
809        # this needs to exactly match the C struct format
810        sidx=0
811        self.status['motor_sync_cnt']=  unpack_int16_t(s[sidx:])
812        sidx += 2
813        return sidx
814
815    def pull_status_aux(self):
816        if not self.hw_valid:
817            return
818        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS_AUX])
819        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_status_aux_reply)
820
821
822    def rpc_status_aux_reply(self,reply):
823        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS_AUX:
824            self.unpack_status_aux(reply[1:])
825        else:
826            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_AUX_STATUS', reply[0])
827
828    def unpack_status_aux(self, s):
829        # take in an array of bytes
830        # this needs to exactly match the C struct format
831        sidx=0
832        self.status_aux['foo']=  unpack_int16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
833        return sidx
834
835    def push_load_test(self):
836        if not self.hw_valid:
837            return
838        payload=self.transport.get_empty_payload()
839        payload[0] = self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PUSH
840        payload[1:] = self.load_test_payload
841        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_push_reply)
842
843    def pull_load_test(self):
844        if not self.hw_valid:
845            return
846        payload = arr.array('B',[self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PULL])
847        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_pull_reply)
848
849
850    def rpc_load_test_push_reply(self, reply):
851        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH:
852            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH', reply[0])
853
854    def rpc_load_test_pull_reply(self, reply):
855        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL:
856            d = reply[1:]
857            for i in range(1024):
858                if d[i] != self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024]:
859                    print('Load test pull bad data', d[i], self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024])
860            self.load_test_payload = d
861            print('Successful load test pull')
862        else:
863            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL', reply[0])
864
865# ######################## PIMU PROTOCOL P4 #################################
866class Pimu_Protocol_P4(PimuBase):
867    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None):  # P4
868        if unpack_to is None:
869            unpack_to = self.status
870        sidx = 0
871        sidx = sidx + Pimu_Protocol_P2.unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to)
872        self.status['current_charge'] = self.get_current_charge(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 4
873        # unpack_to['voltage'] = self.get_voltage(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));
874        # sidx += 4
875        return sidx
876    # def pack_gains(self, s, sidx):
877    #     sidx = sidx + Stepper_Protocol_P3.pack_gains(self, s, sidx)
878    #     pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.gains['voltage_LPF']);

887# ######################## PIMU #################################
888class Pimu(PimuBase):
889    """
890    API to the Stretch Power and IMU board (Pimu)
891    """
892    def __init__(self, event_reset=False, usb=None):
893        PimuBase.__init__(self, event_reset,usb)
894        # Order in descending order so more recent protocols/methods override less recent
895        self.supported_protocols = {'p0': (Pimu_Protocol_P0,), 'p1': (Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
896                                    'p2': (Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
897                                    'p3': (Pimu_Protocol_P3, Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
898                                    'p4': (Pimu_Protocol_P4, Pimu_Protocol_P3, Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,)}
899
900    def startup(self, threaded=False):
901        """
902        First determine which protocol version the uC firmware is running.
903        Based on that version, replaces PimuBase class inheritance with a inheritance to a child class of PimuBase that supports that protocol
904        """
905        PimuBase.startup(self, threaded=threaded)
906        if self.hw_valid:
907            if self.board_info['protocol_version'] in self.supported_protocols:
908                Pimu.__bases__ = self.supported_protocols[self.board_info['protocol_version']]
909                IMU.__bases__= self.imu.supported_protocols[self.board_info['protocol_version']]
910            else:
911                if self.board_info['protocol_version'] is None:
912                    protocol_msg = """
913                                    ----------------
914                                    Failure in communications for {0} on startup.
915                                    Please power cycle the robot and try again.
916                                    ----------------
917                                    """.format(self.name)
918                else:
919                    protocol_msg = """
920                    ----------------
921                    Firmware protocol mismatch on {0}.
922                    Protocol on board is {1}.
923                    Valid protocols are: {2}.
924                    Disabling device.
925                    Please upgrade the firmware and/or version of Stretch Body.
926                    ----------------
927                    """.format(self.name, self.board_info['protocol_version'], self.supported_protocols.keys())
928                self.logger.warning(textwrap.dedent(protocol_msg))
929                self.hw_valid = False
930                self.transport.stop()
931        if self.hw_valid:
932            self.push_command()
933            self.pull_status()
934        return self.hw_valid

206    # ###########  Device Methods #############
207
208    def startup(self, threaded=False):
209        try:
210            Device.startup(self, threaded=threaded)
211            self.hw_valid = self.transport.startup()
212            if self.hw_valid:
213                payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_BOARD_INFO])
214                self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_board_info_reply)
215                self.transport.configure_version(self.board_info['firmware_version'])
216                return True
217            return False
218        except KeyError:
219            self.hw_valid =False
220            return False
221
222
223    def stop(self):
224        Device.stop(self)
225        if not self.hw_valid:
226            return
227        self.set_fan_off()
228        self.push_command(exiting=True)
229        self.transport.stop()
230        self.hw_valid = False
231
232    def set_config(self,c):
233        self.config=c.copy()
234        self._dirty_config = True
235
236    def pull_status(self, exiting=False):
237        if not self.hw_valid:
238            return
239        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS])
240        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_status_reply)
241
242    async def pull_status_async(self, exiting=False):
243        if not self.hw_valid:
244            return
245        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS])
246        await self.transport.do_pull_rpc_async(payload, self.rpc_status_reply, exiting=exiting)
247
248    async def push_command_async(self, exiting=False):
249        if not self.hw_valid:
250            return
251        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
252        if self._dirty_config:
253            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
254            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
255            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
256            self._dirty_config = False
257
258        if self._dirty_trigger:
259            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
260            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
261            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
262            self._trigger = 0
263            self._dirty_trigger = False
264
265    def push_command(self, exiting=False):
266        if not self.hw_valid:
267            return
268        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
269        if self._dirty_config:
270            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
271            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
272            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
273            self._dirty_config = False
274
275        if self._dirty_trigger:
276            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
277            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
278            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
279            self._trigger = 0
280            self._dirty_trigger = False
281
282    def pretty_print(self):
283        print('------ Pimu -----')
284        print('Voltage',self.status['voltage'])
285        print('Current', self.status['current'])
286        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>=3:
287            print('Current Charge',self.status['current_charge'])
288        print('CPU Temp',self.status['cpu_temp'])
289        print('Board Temp', self.status['temp'])
290        print('State', self.status['state'])
291        print('At Cliff', self.status['at_cliff'])
292        print('Cliff Range', self.status['cliff_range'])
293        print('Cliff Event', self.status['cliff_event'])
294        print('Runstop Event', self.status['runstop_event'])
295        print('Bump Event Cnt', self.status['bump_event_cnt'])
296        print('Fan On', self.status['fan_on'])
297        print('Buzzer On', self.status['buzzer_on'])
298        print('Low Voltage Alert', self.status['low_voltage_alert'])
299        print('High Current Alert', self.status['high_current_alert'])
300        print('Over Tilt Alert',self.status['over_tilt_alert'])
301        print('Trace on:', self.status['trace_on'])
302        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>0:
303            print('Charger Connected', self.status['charger_connected'])
304            print('Boot Detected', self.status['boot_detected'])
305        print('Debug', self.status['debug'])
306        print('Timestamp (s)', self.status['timestamp'])
307        #print('Read error', self.transport.status['read_error'])
308        print('Queued motor sync', self.status['motor_sync_queues'])
309        print('Motor sync rate', self.status['motor_sync_rate'])
310        print('Motor sync cnt', self.status['motor_sync_cnt'])
311        print('Board variant:',self.board_info['board_variant'])
312        print('Firmware version:', self.board_info['firmware_version'])
313        print('Transport version:', self.transport.version)
314        self.imu.pretty_print()

319    def runstop_event_reset(self):
320        """
321        Reset the robot runstop, allowing motion to continue
322        """
323        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_RESET
324        self._dirty_trigger=True
325
326    def runstop_event_trigger(self):
327        """
328        Trigger the robot runstop, stopping motion
329        """
330        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_RUNSTOP_ON
331        self._dirty_trigger=True
332
333    def trigger_beep(self):
334        """
335        Generate a single short beep
336        """
337        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_BEEP
338        self._dirty_trigger=True
339
340    def trigger_lightbar_test(self):
341        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_LIGHTBAR_TEST
342        self._dirty_trigger = True
343
344    # ####################### Utility functions ####################################################
345    def imu_reset(self):
346        self._trigger=self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_IMU_RESET
347        self._dirty_trigger=True
348
349
350    def is_ready_for_sync(self):
351        # For RE1.0 robots (hardware_id==0) the runstop and sync line are shared
352        # This limits the maximum rate that the motor sync can be triggered
353        # For RE2.0 robots the sync rate is limited by the min pulse width (~10ms)
354        #Track the rate that the sync is triggered
355        # This is called once prior to issuing stepper push_commands
356        # If it is True then trigger_motor_sync is safe to call after the push_commands
357        # By calling it first, it ensures that the sync rate is accurate (eg, not measuring timing of RPC, etc)
358        t = time.time()
359        if self.ts_last_motor_sync is not None:
360            rate=1 / (t - self.ts_last_motor_sync)
361            if rate>self.params['max_sync_rate_hz']:
362                self.status['motor_sync_drop'] += 1
363                if self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn is None or t-self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn>5.0:
364                    print('Warning: Rate of calls to Pimu:trigger_motor_sync rate of %f above maximum frequency of %.2f Hz. Motor commands dropped: %d'%(rate,self.params['max_sync_rate_hz'],self.status['motor_sync_drop']))
365                    self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn=t
366                return False
367            self.status['motor_sync_rate'] = rate #Only update rate if it is ready
368        return True
369
370    def trigger_motor_sync(self):
371        #Push out immediately
372        if not self.hw_valid:
373            return
374        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_SET_MOTOR_SYNC])
375        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_motor_sync_reply)
376        self.ts_last_motor_sync = time.time()
377
378

403    # ########### Sensor Calibration #################
404    def get_voltage(self,raw):
405        raw_to_V = 20.0/1024 #10bit adc, 0-20V per 0-3.3V reading
406        return raw*raw_to_V
407
408
409    def get_temp(self,raw):
410        raw_to_mV = 3300/1024.0
411        mV = raw*raw_to_mV - 400 #400mV at 0C per spec
412        C = mV/19.5 #19.5mV per C per spec
413        return C
414
415    def get_current(self,raw):
416        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>=3:
417            return self.get_current_efuse(raw)
418        else:
419            return self.get_current_shunt(raw)
420    def get_current_shunt(self,raw):
421        """
422        RE1 / RE2 Pimus using shunt resistor for current measurement
423        """
424        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
425        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
426        mA = mV/.408 # conversion per circuit
427        return mA/1000.0
428
429    def get_current_efuse(self,raw):
430        """
431        S3 Pimu's using Efuse current measurement
432        """
433        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
434        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
435        mA = mV/.224 # conversion per circuit
436        return mA/1000.0
437
438    def get_current_charge(self,raw):
439        """
440        S3 Pimu's shunt measurement of charger current
441        """
442        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
443        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
444        mA = mV/.215 # conversion per circuit
445        return mA/1000.0
446    # ################Data Packing #####################
447
448    def unpack_board_info(self,s):
449        sidx=0
450        self.board_info['board_variant'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
451        self.board_info['hardware_id'] = 0
452        if len(self.board_info['board_variant'])==6: #New format of Pimu.x Older format of Pimu.BoardName.Vx' If older format,default to 0
453            self.board_info['hardware_id']=int(self.board_info['board_variant'][-1])
454        sidx += 20
455        self.board_info['firmware_version'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
456        self.board_info['protocol_version'] = self.board_info['firmware_version'][self.board_info['firmware_version'].rfind('p'):]
457        sidx += 20
458        return sidx
459
460    def pack_config(self,s,sidx):
461        for i in range(4):
462            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_zero'][i])
463            sidx += 4
464        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_thresh']);sidx += 4
465        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_LPF']);sidx += 4
466        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['voltage_LPF']);sidx += 4
467        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['current_LPF']);sidx += 4
468        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['temp_LPF']);sidx += 4
469        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_cliff']); sidx += 1
470        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_runstop']);sidx += 1
471        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_tilt']);sidx += 1
472        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_low_voltage']);sidx += 1
473        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_high_current']); sidx += 1
474        for i in range(3):
475            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_offsets'][i])
476            sidx += 4
477        for i in range(9):
478            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_softiron_matrix'][i])
479            sidx += 4
480        for i in range(3):
481            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gyro_zero_offsets'][i])
482            sidx += 4
483        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['rate_gyro_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
484        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gravity_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
485        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['accel_LPF']); sidx += 4
486        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['bump_thresh']); sidx += 4
487        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['low_voltage_alert']);sidx += 4
488        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['high_current_alert']);sidx += 4
489        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['over_tilt_alert']); sidx += 4
490        return sidx
491
492    def pack_trigger(self,s,sidx):
493        pack_uint32_t(s,sidx,self._trigger); sidx+=4
494        return sidx
495

497        raise NotImplementedError('This method not supported for firmware on protocol {0}.'
498            .format(self.board_info['protocol_version']))

532    def rpc_motor_sync_reply(self,reply):
533        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC:
534            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC', reply[0])
535
536    def rpc_config_reply(self,reply):
537        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_CONFIG:
538            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_CONFIG', reply[0])
539
540    def rpc_board_info_reply(self,reply):
541        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_BOARD_INFO:
542            self.unpack_board_info(reply[1:])
543        else:
544            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_BOARD_INFO', reply[0])
545
546    def rpc_trigger_reply(self,reply):
547        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_TRIGGER:
548            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_TRIGGER', reply[0])
549        else:
550            tt=unpack_uint32_t(reply[1:])
551
552    def rpc_status_reply(self,reply):
553        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS:
554            self.unpack_status(reply[1:])
555        else:
556            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS', reply[0])

559    # ################ Sentry #####################
560    def get_cpu_temp(self):
561        #Note, this call can be slow
562        cpu_temp = 0
563        try:
564            t = psutil.sensors_temperatures()['coretemp']
565            for c in t:
566                cpu_temp = max(cpu_temp, c.current)
567        except(KeyError, IOError): #May not be available on virtual machines
568            cpu_temp=25.0
569        return cpu_temp
570
571    def step_sentry(self,robot=None):
572        if self.hw_valid and self.robot_params['robot_sentry']['base_fan_control']:
573            #Manage CPU temp using the mobile base fan
574            #See https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000005946/intel-nuc.html
575
576            if time.time()-self.ts_get_cpu_temp>10.0: #Once every 10s as is slow changing and is a slow sys call
577                self.status['cpu_temp']=self.get_cpu_temp()
578                self.ts_get_cpu_temp=time.time()
579            if self.status['cpu_temp']>self.params['base_fan_on']:
580                if self.ts_last_fan_on is None or time.time()-self.ts_last_fan_on>3.0: #Will turn itself off if don't refresh command
581                    self.set_fan_on()
582                    self.push_command()
583                    self.ts_last_fan_on = time.time()
584                if  not self.status['fan_on']:
585                    self.logger.debug('Base fan turned on')
586
587            if self.fan_on_last and not self.status['fan_on']:
588                self.logger.debug('Base fan turned off')
589
590            if self.status['cpu_temp']<self.params['base_fan_off']and self.status['fan_on']:
591                self.set_fan_off()
592                self.push_command()
593            self.fan_on_last = self.status['fan_on']

def startup(self, threaded=False): 
208    def startup(self, threaded=False):
209        try:
210            Device.startup(self, threaded=threaded)
211            self.hw_valid = self.transport.startup()
212            if self.hw_valid:
213                payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_BOARD_INFO])
214                self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_board_info_reply)
215                self.transport.configure_version(self.board_info['firmware_version'])
216                return True
217            return False
218        except KeyError:
219            self.hw_valid =False
220            return False

Starts machinery required to interface with this device

Parameters

threaded : bool whether a thread manages hardware polling/pushing in the background

Returns

bool whether the startup procedure succeeded

async def push_command_async(self, exiting=False): 
248    async def push_command_async(self, exiting=False):
249        if not self.hw_valid:
250            return
251        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
252        if self._dirty_config:
253            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
254            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
255            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
256            self._dirty_config = False
257
258        if self._dirty_trigger:
259            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
260            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
261            await self.transport.do_push_rpc_async(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
262            self._trigger = 0
263            self._dirty_trigger = False
def push_command(self, exiting=False): 
265    def push_command(self, exiting=False):
266        if not self.hw_valid:
267            return
268        payload = self.transport.get_empty_payload()
269        if self._dirty_config:
270            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_CONFIG
271            sidx = self.pack_config(payload, 1)
272            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_config_reply)
273            self._dirty_config = False
274
275        if self._dirty_trigger:
276            payload[0] = self.RPC_SET_PIMU_TRIGGER
277            sidx = self.pack_trigger(payload, 1)
278            self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload[:sidx], self.rpc_trigger_reply)
279            self._trigger = 0
280            self._dirty_trigger = False

def is_ready_for_sync(self): 
350    def is_ready_for_sync(self):
351        # For RE1.0 robots (hardware_id==0) the runstop and sync line are shared
352        # This limits the maximum rate that the motor sync can be triggered
353        # For RE2.0 robots the sync rate is limited by the min pulse width (~10ms)
354        #Track the rate that the sync is triggered
355        # This is called once prior to issuing stepper push_commands
356        # If it is True then trigger_motor_sync is safe to call after the push_commands
357        # By calling it first, it ensures that the sync rate is accurate (eg, not measuring timing of RPC, etc)
358        t = time.time()
359        if self.ts_last_motor_sync is not None:
360            rate=1 / (t - self.ts_last_motor_sync)
361            if rate>self.params['max_sync_rate_hz']:
362                self.status['motor_sync_drop'] += 1
363                if self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn is None or t-self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn>5.0:
364                    print('Warning: Rate of calls to Pimu:trigger_motor_sync rate of %f above maximum frequency of %.2f Hz. Motor commands dropped: %d'%(rate,self.params['max_sync_rate_hz'],self.status['motor_sync_drop']))
365                    self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn=t
366                return False
367            self.status['motor_sync_rate'] = rate #Only update rate if it is ready
368        return True
def trigger_motor_sync(self):

375        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_motor_sync_reply)
376        self.ts_last_motor_sync = time.time()

def get_voltage(self, raw): 
404    def get_voltage(self,raw):
405        raw_to_V = 20.0/1024 #10bit adc, 0-20V per 0-3.3V reading
406        return raw*raw_to_V
def get_temp(self, raw): 
409    def get_temp(self,raw):
410        raw_to_mV = 3300/1024.0
411        mV = raw*raw_to_mV - 400 #400mV at 0C per spec
412        C = mV/19.5 #19.5mV per C per spec
413        return C
def get_current(self, raw): 
415    def get_current(self,raw):
416        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>=3:
417            return self.get_current_efuse(raw)
418        else:
419            return self.get_current_shunt(raw)
def get_current_shunt(self, raw): 
420    def get_current_shunt(self,raw):
421        """
422        RE1 / RE2 Pimus using shunt resistor for current measurement
423        """
424        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
425        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
426        mA = mV/.408 # conversion per circuit
427        return mA/1000.0

RE1 / RE2 Pimus using shunt resistor for current measurement

def get_current_efuse(self, raw): 
429    def get_current_efuse(self,raw):
430        """
431        S3 Pimu's using Efuse current measurement
432        """
433        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
434        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
435        mA = mV/.224 # conversion per circuit
436        return mA/1000.0

S3 Pimu's using Efuse current measurement

def get_current_charge(self, raw): 
438    def get_current_charge(self,raw):
439        """
440        S3 Pimu's shunt measurement of charger current
441        """
442        raw_to_mV = 3300 / 1024.0
443        mV = raw * raw_to_mV
444        mA = mV/.215 # conversion per circuit
445        return mA/1000.0

S3 Pimu's shunt measurement of charger current

def unpack_board_info(self, s): 
448    def unpack_board_info(self,s):
449        sidx=0
450        self.board_info['board_variant'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
451        self.board_info['hardware_id'] = 0
452        if len(self.board_info['board_variant'])==6: #New format of Pimu.x Older format of Pimu.BoardName.Vx' If older format,default to 0
453            self.board_info['hardware_id']=int(self.board_info['board_variant'][-1])
454        sidx += 20
455        self.board_info['firmware_version'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], 20)
456        self.board_info['protocol_version'] = self.board_info['firmware_version'][self.board_info['firmware_version'].rfind('p'):]
457        sidx += 20
458        return sidx
def pack_config(self, s, sidx): 
460    def pack_config(self,s,sidx):
461        for i in range(4):
462            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_zero'][i])
463            sidx += 4
464        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_thresh']);sidx += 4
465        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['cliff_LPF']);sidx += 4
466        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['voltage_LPF']);sidx += 4
467        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['current_LPF']);sidx += 4
468        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['temp_LPF']);sidx += 4
469        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_cliff']); sidx += 1
470        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_runstop']);sidx += 1
471        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_tilt']);sidx += 1
472        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_low_voltage']);sidx += 1
473        pack_uint8_t(s, sidx, self.config['stop_at_high_current']); sidx += 1
474        for i in range(3):
475            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_offsets'][i])
476            sidx += 4
477        for i in range(9):
478            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['mag_softiron_matrix'][i])
479            sidx += 4
480        for i in range(3):
481            pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gyro_zero_offsets'][i])
482            sidx += 4
483        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['rate_gyro_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
484        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['gravity_vector_scale']); sidx += 4
485        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['accel_LPF']); sidx += 4
486        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['bump_thresh']); sidx += 4
487        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['low_voltage_alert']);sidx += 4
488        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['high_current_alert']);sidx += 4
489        pack_float_t(s, sidx, self.config['over_tilt_alert']); sidx += 4
490        return sidx
def pack_trigger(self, s, sidx): 
492    def pack_trigger(self,s,sidx):
493        pack_uint32_t(s,sidx,self._trigger); sidx+=4
494        return sidx

def get_cpu_temp(self): 
560    def get_cpu_temp(self):
561        #Note, this call can be slow
562        cpu_temp = 0
563        try:
564            t = psutil.sensors_temperatures()['coretemp']
565            for c in t:
566                cpu_temp = max(cpu_temp, c.current)
567        except(KeyError, IOError): #May not be available on virtual machines
568            cpu_temp=25.0
569        return cpu_temp
def step_sentry(self, robot=None): 
571    def step_sentry(self,robot=None):
572        if self.hw_valid and self.robot_params['robot_sentry']['base_fan_control']:
573            #Manage CPU temp using the mobile base fan
574            #See https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000005946/intel-nuc.html
575
576            if time.time()-self.ts_get_cpu_temp>10.0: #Once every 10s as is slow changing and is a slow sys call
577                self.status['cpu_temp']=self.get_cpu_temp()
578                self.ts_get_cpu_temp=time.time()
579            if self.status['cpu_temp']>self.params['base_fan_on']:
580                if self.ts_last_fan_on is None or time.time()-self.ts_last_fan_on>3.0: #Will turn itself off if don't refresh command
581                    self.set_fan_on()
582                    self.push_command()
583                    self.ts_last_fan_on = time.time()
584                if  not self.status['fan_on']:
585                    self.logger.debug('Base fan turned on')
586
587            if self.fan_on_last and not self.status['fan_on']:
588                self.logger.debug('Base fan turned off')
589
590            if self.status['cpu_temp']<self.params['base_fan_off']and self.status['fan_on']:
591                self.set_fan_off()
592                self.push_command()
593            self.fan_on_last = self.status['fan_on']

class Pimu_Protocol_P0(PimuBase): 
600class Pimu_Protocol_P0(PimuBase):
601    def unpack_status(self,s, unpack_to=None):
602        if unpack_to is None:
603            unpack_to = self.status
604        sidx=0
605        sidx +=self.imu.unpack_status((s[sidx:]))
606        unpack_to['voltage']=self.get_voltage(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
607        unpack_to['current'] = self.get_current(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
608        unpack_to['temp'] = self.get_temp(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
609
610        for i in range(4):
611            unpack_to['cliff_range'][i]=unpack_float_t(s[sidx:])
612            sidx+=4
613
614        unpack_to['state'] = unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])
615        sidx += 4
616
617        unpack_to['at_cliff']=[]
618        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_0) != 0)
619        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_1) != 0)
620        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_2) != 0)
621        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_3) != 0)
622        unpack_to['runstop_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_RUNSTOP_EVENT) != 0
623        unpack_to['cliff_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CLIFF_EVENT) != 0
624        unpack_to['fan_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_FAN_ON) != 0
625        unpack_to['buzzer_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BUZZER_ON) != 0
626        unpack_to['low_voltage_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_LOW_VOLTAGE_ALERT) != 0
627        unpack_to['high_current_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_HIGH_CURRENT_ALERT) != 0
628        unpack_to['over_tilt_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_OVER_TILT_ALERT) != 0
629        unpack_to['charger_connected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CHARGER_CONNECTED) != 0
630        unpack_to['boot_detected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BOOT_DETECTED) != 0
631        unpack_to['timestamp'] = self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])); sidx += 4
632        unpack_to['bump_event_cnt'] = unpack_uint16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
633        unpack_to['debug'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]); sidx += 4
634        return sidx

class Pimu_Protocol_P2(PimuBase): 
679class Pimu_Protocol_P2(PimuBase):
680
681    def read_firmware_trace(self):
682        self.trace_buf = []
683        self.timestamp.reset() #Timestamp holds state, reset within lock to avoid threading issues
684        self.n_trace_read=1
685        ts=time.time()
686        while ( self.n_trace_read) and time.time()-ts<60.0:
687            payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_READ_TRACE])
688            self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_read_firmware_trace_reply)
689            time.sleep(.001)
690        return self.trace_buf
691
692    def unpack_debug_trace(self,s,unpack_to):
693        sidx=0
694        unpack_to['u8_1']=unpack_uint8_t(s[sidx:]);sidx+=1
695        unpack_to['u8_2'] = unpack_uint8_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 1
696        unpack_to['f_1'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
697        unpack_to['f_2'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
698        unpack_to['f_3'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
699        return sidx
700
701    def unpack_print_trace(self,s,unpack_to):
702        sidx=0
703        line_len=32
704        unpack_to['timestamp']=self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint64_t(s[sidx:]));sidx += 8
705        unpack_to['line'] = unpack_string_t(s[sidx:], line_len); sidx += line_len
706        unpack_to['x'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 4
707        return sidx
708
709    def rpc_read_firmware_trace_reply(self, reply):
710        if len(reply)>0 and reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_READ_TRACE:
711            self.n_trace_read=reply[1]
712            self.trace_buf.append({'id': len(self.trace_buf), 'status': {},'debug':{},'print':{}})
713            if reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_STATUS:
714                self.trace_buf[-1]['status']= self.status_zero.copy()
715                self.unpack_status(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['status'])
716            elif reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_DEBUG:
717                self.unpack_debug_trace(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['debug'])
718            elif reply[2]==self.TRACE_TYPE_PRINT:
719                self.unpack_print_trace(reply[3:],unpack_to=self.trace_buf[-1]['print'])
720            else:
721                print('Unrecognized trace type %d'%reply[2])
722        else:
723            print('Error RPC_REPLY_READ_TRACE')
724            self.n_trace_read=0
725            self.trace_buf = []
726    def enable_firmware_trace(self):
727        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_ENABLE_TRACE
728        self._dirty_trigger = True
729
730    def disable_firmware_trace(self):
731        self._trigger = self._trigger | self.TRIGGER_DISABLE_TRACE
732        self._dirty_trigger = True
733
734    def unpack_status(self, s, unpack_to=None): #P2
735        if unpack_to is None:
736            unpack_to = self.status
737
738        sidx=0
739        sidx +=self.imu.unpack_status((s[sidx:]))
740        unpack_to['voltage']=self.get_voltage(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
741        unpack_to['current'] = self.get_current(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
742        unpack_to['temp'] = self.get_temp(unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]));sidx+=4
743
744        for i in range(4):
745            unpack_to['cliff_range'][i]=unpack_float_t(s[sidx:])
746            sidx+=4
747
748        unpack_to['state'] = unpack_uint32_t(s[sidx:])
749        sidx += 4
750
751        unpack_to['at_cliff']=[]
752        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & PimuBase.STATE_AT_CLIFF_0) != 0)
753        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_1) != 0)
754        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_2) != 0)
755        unpack_to['at_cliff'].append((unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_AT_CLIFF_3) != 0)
756        unpack_to['runstop_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_RUNSTOP_EVENT) != 0
757        unpack_to['cliff_event'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CLIFF_EVENT) != 0
758        unpack_to['fan_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_FAN_ON) != 0
759        unpack_to['buzzer_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BUZZER_ON) != 0
760        unpack_to['low_voltage_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_LOW_VOLTAGE_ALERT) != 0
761        unpack_to['high_current_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_HIGH_CURRENT_ALERT) != 0
762        unpack_to['over_tilt_alert'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_OVER_TILT_ALERT) != 0
763        if self.board_info['hardware_id']>0:
764            unpack_to['charger_connected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_CHARGER_CONNECTED) != 0
765            unpack_to['boot_detected'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_BOOT_DETECTED) != 0
766        unpack_to['trace_on'] = (unpack_to['state'] & self.STATE_IS_TRACE_ON) != 0
767        unpack_to['timestamp'] = self.timestamp.set(unpack_uint64_t(s[sidx:])); sidx += 8
768        self.imu.status['timestamp'] = unpack_to['timestamp']
769        unpack_to['bump_event_cnt'] = unpack_uint16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
770        unpack_to['debug'] = unpack_float_t(s[sidx:]); sidx += 4
771        return sidx

class Pimu_Protocol_P3(PimuBase): 
774class Pimu_Protocol_P3(PimuBase):
775
776
777    def is_ready_for_sync(self):
778        """
779        With P3 this function is no longer meaningful as sync overruns are handled on the fw level
780        """
781        return True
782    def trigger_motor_sync(self):
783        # Push out immediately
784        if not self.hw_valid:
785            return
786        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_SET_MOTOR_SYNC])
787        old_sync_cnt = self.status['motor_sync_cnt']
788        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_motor_sync_reply)
789
790        t=time.time()
791        # Should motor_sync_cnt should increment with each call to trigger_motor_sync, if not it is an overrun
792        if self.status['motor_sync_cnt'] == old_sync_cnt:
793            self.status['motor_sync_queues']=self.status['motor_sync_queues']+1
794            print('Warning: Queued motor_sync as trigger_motor_sync calls above maximum rate. Overruns: %d' % (self.status['motor_sync_queues']))
795            self.ts_last_motor_sync_warn = t
796
797        if self.ts_last_motor_sync is not None:
798            self.status['motor_sync_rate']=1 / (t - self.ts_last_motor_sync)
799        self.ts_last_motor_sync = t
800
801    def rpc_motor_sync_reply(self,reply):
802        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC:
803            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_MOTOR_SYNC', reply[0])
804        else:
805            self.unpack_motor_sync_reply(reply[1:])
806
807
808    def unpack_motor_sync_reply(self, s):
809        # take in an array of bytes
810        # this needs to exactly match the C struct format
811        sidx=0
812        self.status['motor_sync_cnt']=  unpack_int16_t(s[sidx:])
813        sidx += 2
814        return sidx
815
816    def pull_status_aux(self):
817        if not self.hw_valid:
818            return
819        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS_AUX])
820        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_status_aux_reply)
821
822
823    def rpc_status_aux_reply(self,reply):
824        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_PIMU_STATUS_AUX:
825            self.unpack_status_aux(reply[1:])
826        else:
827            self.logger.warning('Error RPC_REPLY_PIMU_AUX_STATUS', reply[0])
828
829    def unpack_status_aux(self, s):
830        # take in an array of bytes
831        # this needs to exactly match the C struct format
832        sidx=0
833        self.status_aux['foo']=  unpack_int16_t(s[sidx:]);sidx += 2
834        return sidx
835
836    def push_load_test(self):
837        if not self.hw_valid:
838            return
839        payload=self.transport.get_empty_payload()
840        payload[0] = self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PUSH
841        payload[1:] = self.load_test_payload
842        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_push_reply)
843
844    def pull_load_test(self):
845        if not self.hw_valid:
846            return
847        payload = arr.array('B',[self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PULL])
848        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_pull_reply)
849
850
851    def rpc_load_test_push_reply(self, reply):
852        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH:
853            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH', reply[0])
854
855    def rpc_load_test_pull_reply(self, reply):
856        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL:
857            d = reply[1:]
858            for i in range(1024):
859                if d[i] != self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024]:
860                    print('Load test pull bad data', d[i], self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024])
861            self.load_test_payload = d
862            print('Successful load test pull')
863        else:
864            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL', reply[0])

def pull_status_aux(self): 
816    def pull_status_aux(self):
817        if not self.hw_valid:
818            return
819        payload = arr.array('B', [self.RPC_GET_PIMU_STATUS_AUX])

def rpc_status_aux_reply(self, reply):

def push_load_test(self): 
836    def push_load_test(self):
837        if not self.hw_valid:
838            return
839        payload=self.transport.get_empty_payload()
840        payload[0] = self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PUSH
841        payload[1:] = self.load_test_payload
842        self.transport.do_push_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_push_reply)
def pull_load_test(self): 
844    def pull_load_test(self):
845        if not self.hw_valid:
846            return
847        payload = arr.array('B',[self.RPC_LOAD_TEST_PULL])
848        self.transport.do_pull_rpc_sync(payload, self.rpc_load_test_pull_reply)
def rpc_load_test_push_reply(self, reply): 
851    def rpc_load_test_push_reply(self, reply):
852        if reply[0] != self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH:
853            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PUSH', reply[0])
def rpc_load_test_pull_reply(self, reply): 
855    def rpc_load_test_pull_reply(self, reply):
856        if reply[0] == self.RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL:
857            d = reply[1:]
858            for i in range(1024):
859                if d[i] != self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024]:
860                    print('Load test pull bad data', d[i], self.load_test_payload[(i + 1) % 1024])
861            self.load_test_payload = d
862            print('Successful load test pull')
863        else:
864            print('Error RPC_REPLY_LOAD_TEST_PULL', reply[0])

class Pimu(PimuBase): 
889class Pimu(PimuBase):
890    """
891    API to the Stretch Power and IMU board (Pimu)
892    """
893    def __init__(self, event_reset=False, usb=None):
894        PimuBase.__init__(self, event_reset,usb)
895        # Order in descending order so more recent protocols/methods override less recent
896        self.supported_protocols = {'p0': (Pimu_Protocol_P0,), 'p1': (Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
897                                    'p2': (Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
898                                    'p3': (Pimu_Protocol_P3, Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,),
899                                    'p4': (Pimu_Protocol_P4, Pimu_Protocol_P3, Pimu_Protocol_P2, Pimu_Protocol_P1, Pimu_Protocol_P0,)}
900
901    def startup(self, threaded=False):
902        """
903        First determine which protocol version the uC firmware is running.
904        Based on that version, replaces PimuBase class inheritance with a inheritance to a child class of PimuBase that supports that protocol
905        """
906        PimuBase.startup(self, threaded=threaded)
907        if self.hw_valid:
908            if self.board_info['protocol_version'] in self.supported_protocols:
909                Pimu.__bases__ = self.supported_protocols[self.board_info['protocol_version']]
910                IMU.__bases__= self.imu.supported_protocols[self.board_info['protocol_version']]
911            else:
912                if self.board_info['protocol_version'] is None:
913                    protocol_msg = """
914                                    ----------------
915                                    Failure in communications for {0} on startup.
916                                    Please power cycle the robot and try again.
917                                    ----------------
918                                    """.format(self.name)
919                else:
920                    protocol_msg = """
921                    ----------------
922                    Firmware protocol mismatch on {0}.
923                    Protocol on board is {1}.
924                    Valid protocols are: {2}.
925                    Disabling device.
926                    Please upgrade the firmware and/or version of Stretch Body.
927                    ----------------
928                    """.format(self.name, self.board_info['protocol_version'], self.supported_protocols.keys())
929                self.logger.warning(textwrap.dedent(protocol_msg))
930                self.hw_valid = False
931                self.transport.stop()
932        if self.hw_valid:
933            self.push_command()
934            self.pull_status()
935        return self.hw_valid
